Second Skin.name: Second Skin
Second Skin.description: Innate: Kai'Sa's basic attacks deal 4 − 10 (based on level) (+ 1 − 5 (based on level) per Plasma stack) (+ 10% − 20% (based on Plasma stacks) AP)  bonus magic damage.
Second Skin.description2: Innate - Caustic Wounds: Kai'Sa's basic attacks,  Void Seeker, and nearby allies'  immobilizing effects mark enemies with Plasma for 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times. Kai'Sa's attacks or  Void Seeker can then rupture enemies with 4 Plasma, consuming them to deal 15% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of the target's missing health magic damage, capped at 400 against monsters.
Second Skin.description3: Innate - Living Weapon: Upon gaining a set amount of permanent stats from items and stat growth, Kai'Sa can evolve the related basic ability. This has a channel time of 2 seconds, and the upgrade is lost if the stat requirement is no longer met.
Second Skin.notes:
* Allied  immobilizing effects cannot rupture the Plasma.
 Plasma which exceed the 5th stack are applied normally.
 Stats from runes do not count toward the minimum requirement to upgrade a basic ability.

Icathian Rain.name: Icathian Rain
Icathian Rain.description: Active: Kai'Sa releases a swarm of 6 missiles that evenly distributes among nearby  visible enemies, each dealing  physical damage.  Minions below  35% health take double damage.
Icathian Rain.description2: Non-minions take 25% damage from missiles beyond their first.
Icathian Rain.description3: Living Weapon: Requires  100 − 72 (based on level) bonus attack damage to upgrade – Icathian Rain fires 10 missiles.
Icathian Rain.leveling3: Maximum Evolved Single-Target Damage:146.25 / 199.0625 / 251.875 / 304.6875 / 357.5 (+ 113.75% bonus AD) (+ 130% AP)
Icathian Rain.notes:
*  Spell shields only block the damage from a single missile.
 Icathian Rain has no cast time and does not interrupt Kai'Sa's previous orders.
 Icathian Rain acquires its targets upon cast. Moving will not change its targets.

 Charging  Supercharge will not stop the missiles from firing.

Void Seeker.name: Void Seeker
Void Seeker.description: Active: Kai'Sa fires a Void blast in the target direction, stopping at the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage, gaining  true sight of them for 4 seconds and applying 2 Plasma.
Void Seeker.description2: Living Weapon: Requires  100 ability power to upgrade – Void Seeker applies 3 Plasma and refunds 50% of the  cooldown against  champions.
Void Seeker.notes:
* If the stacks detonate Plasma, any remaining stacks are reapplied afterwards.
 Void Seeker also deals Second Skin's damage based on Plasma stacks on the target.
 This increases the base damage by Second Skin's base damage, and further increased by at least 22.5% AP (10% + 12.5%), and up to 37.5% AP (17.5% + 20%).
 When evolved, the AP ratio increases by at least 37.5% AP (10% + 12.5% + 15%), and up to 52.5% AP (15% + 17.5% + 20%).

Supercharge.name: Supercharge
Supercharge.description: Active: Kai'Sa  charges for 1.2 − 0.6 (based on bonus attack speed) seconds, gaining  bonus movement speed, increased by 0% − 100% (based on bonus attack speed).
Supercharge.description2: After charging up, Kai'Sa gains  bonus attack speed and her windup percentage is reduced to 6.44% for 4 seconds.
Supercharge.description3: Supercharge's  cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds on-attack.
Supercharge.description4: Living Weapon: Requires  100% − 70% (based on level) bonus attack speed to upgrade – Supercharge grants  invisibility for 0.5 seconds.

Killer Instinct.name: Killer Instinct
Killer Instinct.description: Active: Kai'Sa  shields herself and  dashes to a target location near an enemy champion recently affected by Plasma. The shield holds for 2 seconds upon arrival.
Killer Instinct.notes: * Kai'Sa will move to the casting location regardless of whether she can dash.
